thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Ana Menez
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Ana Menez

author: Ana Menez
title: Ana Menez
text: It’s helpful and highly informative. I’ve been experimenting on weight loss practices for a long time and Brian has reminded me of principles I need to keep as I plan my diet and activities. There are things I have been doing on my own like fasting weekly and now I found affirmation and encouragement to keep doing it. The book is not selling something new, it simply discusses time-tested principles: making sure you eat less than what you can burn, maintaining physical activity and doing it early to kickstart metabolism, choosing right foods to stay nourished, and more.
